attributes.action: Close all schools and places of education, in favour of remote learning at home
attributes.additional_details: I don’t think it’s going to be any use going into a “full” lockdown, when all the places of education remain open, this is one of the main problem areas, to get covid under control, the above needs to happen now.
attributes.background: Covid is rife in places of education, it took hold again when the schools went back in September, students can be carriers and take covid home to vulnerable family members, they could be taught over the internet in the form of remote classes, with the work having to be sent in each day!

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Close all Schools and colleges and Universities during second lockdown: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557413

Close Schools and Colleges during a second nationwide lockdown: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557012

Force Universities to close commencing National Lockdown on November 5th 2020: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/558383

Reclose schools and colleges due to increase in COVID-19 cases: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550846

Require university campuses to close to stop the spread of COVID-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552512
